verses.kjv: MAKE HASTE, O GOD, TO DELIVER ME; MAKE HASTE TO HELP ME, O LORD.
verses.ct: Hurry, God, and rescue me! Rush to help me, LORD!

verses.kjv: Let them be ashamed and confounded that seek after my soul: let them be turned backward, and put to confusion, that desire my hurt.
verses.ct: Let those who are trying to kill me be humiliated and disgraced. Let those who want to see me harmed be driven back in shame.

verses.kjv: Let them be turned back for a reward of their shame that say, Aha, aha.
verses.ct: Let those who mock me saying, 'Ha! Ha!' be forced to retreat because of their disgrace.

verses.kjv: Let all those that seek thee rejoice and be glad in thee: and let such as love thy salvation say continually, Let God be magnified.
verses.ct: But let everyone who searches for you celebrate and find joy in you. Let those who love your salvation never stop saying, 'God is great!'

verses.kjv: But I am poor and needy: make haste unto me, O God: thou art my help and my deliverer; O LORD, make no tarrying.
verses.ct: As for me, I am weak and in need â€” come quickly to me, God! You are my help and my rescuer; LORD, don't delay!
